document_data.caption: A map showing Llorgh in Norheim.
document_data.name: Llorgh
document_data.mainbody: '''Llorgh''' was a large island within the kingdom of [[Norheim]] in the [[Moonshae Isles]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: Moonshae Isles|11}}
document_data.Geography: Llorgh was located in the southeast region of the Norheim archipelago approximately {{SI|20|mi|k|long=yes}} off the coast of [[Gnarhelm]]. It was second in size only to [[Giantspine]] among the islands of Norheim. [[Northwind Strait]] passed between Llorgh and Giantspine. Llorgh was {{SI|25|mi|k|long=yes}} long and about {{SI|10|mi|k|long=yes}} wide on average.
